patterns.pattern: ^(.+) skitters in from the shadows of the forest\.$
^Searching for wood, (.+) wanders into view\.$
^A hole opens up in a nearby tree as (.+) burrows out and falls to the ground\.$
^Covered in wood pulp, (.+) scuttles in, its long proboscis waving in the air\.$
^Its long proboscis detecting some tasty wood, (.+) scuttles out of view\.$
^You are unable to follow (.+) as it scuttles off into the forest's shadows\.$
^(.+) burrows into a tree and disappears\.$
You have slain .+ weevil.
^With a squeak, an? .*rat darts into the room, looking about wildly.$
^Your eyes are drawn to an? .*rat that darts suddenly into view.$
^An? .*rat wanders into view, nosing about for food.$
^An? .*rat noses its way cautiously out of the shadows.$
^An? .*rat darts into the shadows and disappears.$
^An? .*rat wanders back into its warren where you may not follow.$
^With a flick of its small whiskers, an? .*rat dashes out of view.$
You have slain an? .*rat.
^Flapping its wings furiously, an? .*pigeon flies in and discharges white droppings.$
^A foul stench arises as an? .*pigeon enters and ruffles its feathers, spraying dirty water everywhere.$
^You notice an? .*pigeon circling from above, searching for garbage.$
^Soaring from above, an? .*pigeon suddenly darts in and stares at you with greedy eyes.$
^Discharging white droppings, an? .*pigeon flies off into the distance.$
^An? .*pigeon flutters aimlessly away.$
^With a loud squawk, an? .*pigeon takes wing and flies away.$
You have slain an? .*pigeon.
^With a deep croak, an? .*lizard crawls in and noses around for garbage.$
^Slithering in on all fours, an? .*lizard suddenly stops and hisses at you.$
^Climbing out of some dirty ashes, an? .*lizard scrambles about here.$
^An? .*lizard slinks in, lashing its tail back and forth.$
^An? .*lizard quickly slinks off and out of view.$
^Flicking its tail, an? .*lizard slithers away and disappears.$
^With a final hiss at you, an? .*lizard burrows into a pile of ashes.$
You have slain an? .*lizard.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a giant ugly pincher.
An ugly pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
A tiny pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
A giant ugly pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
An ugly pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
A tiny pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a tiny pincher.
A giant ugly pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of an ugly pincher.
Mandibles clicking, a tiny pincher scuttles away to a safe crevice.
Mandibles clicking, an ugly pincher scuttles away to a safe crevice.
Mandibles clicking, a giant ugly pincher scuttles away to a safe crevice.
An giant ugly pincher trundles off into a dark corner and out of sight.
An ugly pincher trundles off into a dark corner and out of sight.
A tiny pincher trundles off into a dark corner and out of sight.
^Having slain (.+), you retrieve the corpse.$
A small quantity of sovereigns spills from the corpse.
